Content: 21*p45028a02128* *(c) describe the role of the heart valves in the cardiac cycle.(6) (d) a small number of babies are born with a hole in the septum that separates the left and right ventricles.  if the hole is not repaired these babies may not survive.  suggest why these babies may not survive.(2) (total for question 7 = 11 marks)turn over
